attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The PM has not got a mandate to run the country, as he was not elected by the people (at an election).  Tony Blair was fairly elected by the country via the electoral system.  Gordon Brown was not the leader of the Labour Party and yet is now PM. To gain legitimacy an election should be called.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
